title: Guild Wars forum new forum app ?

comments.author: Ice of Dragons.1637
comments.body:
Tiscan.8345:

Why not use the RSS feeds the forum provides?

This board: https://forum-en.guildwars2.com/forum/community/api.rss
Dev-Tracker: https://forum-en.guildwars2.com/forum/info/devtracker.rss
etc.

Only “problem” is, that there is no Feed for the whole forum… but this can easily be solved by using http://www.rssmix.com/ to combine all feeds.

This looks amazing. Thank you.
